metadata.label: Tech Professional
metadata.description: Already working in tech, looking to advance or switch roles

heroContext.subtitle: Accelerate your growth in the tech industry
heroContext.subtext: Leverage your existing experience to reach your next career milestone

companiesInsightAdaptation.title: Company Fit for Experienced Engineers
companiesInsightAdaptation.subtitle: Where your skills are valued most
companiesInsightAdaptation.emphasis: You have the advantage of proven experience - companies will focus on your ability to impact

interviewPreparationContext.title: Interview Preparation for Experienced Engineers
interviewPreparationContext.subtitle: Shift focus from fundamentals to impact and complexity
interviewPreparationContext.emphasis: Your interviews will focus on: architectural thinking, design decisions, leadership, and business impact

keyAreas.description: Deep-dive into complex systems at scale
keyAreas.focus: You're expected to discuss trade-offs, optimization, and real production challenges

keyAreas.description: Discuss real decisions you've made in production
keyAreas.focus: Why did you choose this tech? What were the alternatives? What would you do differently?

keyAreas.description: How you've led teams, mentored junior engineers, or driven initiatives
keyAreas.focus: Demonstrate impact beyond your own code

keyAreas.description: Complex problems you've solved in real systems

learningPathAdaptation.title: Accelerated Learning for Tech Professionals
learningPathAdaptation.emphasis: Build on your existing foundation rather than starting from scratch

projectsAdaptation.title: Project Strategy for Experienced Engineers
projectsAdaptation.subtitle: Choose projects that showcase next-level thinking
projectsAdaptation.guidance: As an experienced engineer, focus on projects that demonstrate architectural thinking and complexity. Choose 1-2 major projects over many small ones.

skillGapAdaptation.title: Your Skill Evolution Assessment
skillGapAdaptation.subtitle: Identifying gaps in your progression to the next level
skillGapAdaptation.approach: We're not starting from zero - we're identifying the 20% of skills that will accelerate you 10x
focus: Specialized knowledge in your target domain
Emerging technologies relevant to your path
Soft skills for leadership or specialized roles

timelineContext.reasoning: Your experience means you'll learn faster, but deep mastery still takes time
timelineContext.note: We've adjusted timelines to be 25% shorter based on your experience level, but quality over speed

companies: Your goal is not just to find a job, but to find the RIGHT role at the RIGHT company
compensation: You should be negotiating for senior-level compensation
Consider equity, growth, and long-term value
impact: Seek roles where your architectural thinking matters
Look for technical authority and influence
